channel.title: How do you make commands like ::starter and ::barrows?

item.title: How do you make commands like ::starter and ::barrows?
item.dc:creator: @Gol_Goroth Gol Goroth
item.description:
@Gol_Goroth wrote:

[quote=“Mopar Helper, post:2, topic:52070”]Ok, ill give you a guide but, really you need the code generator by fr33sc4p3.
open your client and type in the name of a command etc. food.

[code] }

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“food”)) {
addItem(1050, 10);
sendMessage("Here, have this great THING. "+playerName);
}
[/code]
the code for

 if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("food"))

is important because it says the command,

 	addItem(

were could we find this code generator

Read full topic

item.title: How do you make commands like ::starter and ::barrows?
item.dc:creator: @Mopar_Helper Mopar Helper
item.description:
@Mopar_Helper wrote:

Ok, ill give you a guide but, really you need the code generator by fr33sc4p3.
open your client and type in the name of a command etc. food.

[code] }

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“food”)) {
addItem(1050, 10);
sendMessage("Here, have this great THING. "+playerName);
}
[/code]
the code for

 if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("food"))

is important because it says the command,

addItem( is what you get from it.
